## ðŸŽ¯ Vision

Automatisiere die Promotion deiner Songs durch intelligente Playlist-Distribution auf Spotify, YouTube und mehr.

## ðŸ—ï¸ Tech Stack

- **Framework:** Next.js 15 (App Router)
- **Language:** TypeScript
- **Database:** PostgreSQL + Prisma
- **Auth:** NextAuth.js v5
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS + Shadcn/ui

## ðŸ“¦ Installation

```bash
# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/skquievreux/playlist_generator.git
cd playlist_generator

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Setup environment variables
cp .env.example .env.local
# Edit .env.local with your credentials

# Setup database
npx prisma migrate dev
npx prisma db seed

# Run development server
npm run dev
```

Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)

## ðŸ“¡ API Reference

### YouTube API

> ðŸ“˜ **Full API Documentation**: A complete OpenAPI specification is available at [`/openapi.json`](/openapi.json) when running the application.

#### Validate API Key
```http
GET /api/youtube?action=validate
```

#### Search Videos
```http
GET /api/youtube?action=search&q={query}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "video-id",
      "title": "Song Title",
      "artist": "Artist Name",
      "viewCount": 1500000,
      "duration": "PT3M37S",
      "publishedAt": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    }
  ]
}
```

#### Search Playlists
```http
GET /api/youtube/playlists?q={query}
```

#### Import YouTube Playlist
```http
POST /api/youtube/import-playlist
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer {token}

{
  "url": "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAYLIST_ID"
}
```

**Supported URL formats:**
- `https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAYLIST_ID`
- `https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID&list=PLAYLIST_ID`
- `https://youtu.be/VIDEO_ID?list=PLAYLIST_ID`

**Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "playlistId": "OLAK5uy_...",
    "totalVideos": 150,
    "importedSongs": 147,
    "songs": [
      {
        "id": "song-id",
        "title": "Song Title",
        "artist": "Artist Name",
        "youtubeUrl": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID",
        "viewCount": 1250000,
        "duration": "PT3M45S",
        "source": "youtube_playlist"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

### Authentication API

#### NextAuth.js Routes
```http
GET  /api/auth/signin
POST /api/auth/signin
GET  /api/auth/signout
POST /api/auth/signout
GET  /api/auth/session
GET  /api/auth/providers
```

### Songs API

#### Get All Songs
```http
GET /api/songs
Authorization: Bearer {token}
```

#### Upload Song
```http
POST /api/songs/upload
Content-Type: multipart/form-data
Authorization: Bearer {token}

# Form fields:
file: [audio-file]        # WAV, MP3, FLAC (max 50MB)
title: "Song Title"       # Required
artist: "Artist Name"     # Required
album: "Album Name"       # Optional
genre: "pop"              # Optional
albumArt: [image-file]    # Optional (JPG, PNG)
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "song": {
      "id": "song-id",
      "title": "Song Title",
      "artist": "Artist Name",
      "album": "Album Name",
      "genre": ["pop"],
      "mood": ["unknown"]
    }
  }
}
```

#### Find Video Matches for Song
```http
POST /api/songs/find-matches
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer {token}

{
  "songId": "song-id"
}
```

#### Get Video Matches for Song
```http
GET /api/songs/matches?songId={song-id}
Authorization: Bearer {token}
```

#### Select Video Match
```http
POST /api/songs/matches
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer {token}

{
  "songId": "song-id",
  "videoId": "video-id"
}
```

### Song Generator API

#### Generate Songs from Image/Text
```http
POST /api/song-generator/generate
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

# For image upload:
image: [file]              # JPG, PNG, GIF (max 10MB)
context: "Additional context" (optional)

# For text input:
text: "Song inspiration text"
context: "Additional context" (optional)
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "generated-1234567890-0",
      "title": "Electric Dreams",
      "artist": "Neon Pulse",
      "genre": ["electronic", "synthwave"],
      "mood": ["energetic", "futuristic"],
      "description": "A high-energy track about digital transformation",
      "releaseYear": 2024,
      "confidence": 0.89,
      "reasoning": "Based on the neon lights and digital interface elements in the image"
    }
  ],
  "count": 3
}
```

#### Analyze Image
```http
POST /api/song-generator/analyze
Content-Type: multipart/form-data

image: [file]              # Image file for analysis
```

#### Save Generated Songs
```http
POST /api/song-generator/save
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer {token}

{
  "songs": [
    {
      "title": "Electric Dreams",
      "artist": "Neon Pulse",
      "genre": ["electronic"],
      "mood": ["energetic"]
    }
  ],
  "userId": "user-id"
}
```

### Playlists API

#### Get All Playlists
```http
GET /api/playlists
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "playlist-id",
      "name": "Indie Vibes 2024",
      "platform": "SPOTIFY",
      "genre": "[\"indie\",\"alternative\"]",
      "followers": 1250
    }
  ]
}
```
